title: [修正]CustomHelpMenu——自定义/help菜单的内容[1.8-1.10]
author: 白羊羊
txt_content:
本帖最后由 mimimis 于 2017-8-30 15:59 编辑 

原帖介绍（未汉化，内含效果图）Have you ever wanted an entirely customizable help menu for your players?

Well that's just what this plugin does for you!
?
Unlimited amount of lines?Color Coded with " & "?If the player doesn't have the "help.administrate" permission, it just shows the Help Menu!?

Here are a few examples of what the plugin can do

The Default Config

 

Remove Command
 
 

Set Line Command

 

Even More Commands Than Just That!
- Commands -?
/Help - Displays Help Menu
/Help Set <LINE NUMBER> <LINE> - Set's a specified line to something new./Help Add <LINE> - Add's a entirely new line to the Help Menu/Help Remove <LINE NUMBER> - Remove's the specified line from the Help Menu.
/Help Reset - Reset's the config to Default Settings./Help Clear - Clear's the entire help menu.
?
- Permissions -?
-/Help - Everyone-/Help Set/Add/Remove/Reset/Clear - help.administrate



简介
这个插件可以自定义/help 菜单，就是玩家输入/help之后，看到的不是指令，而是你自定义的内容！

指令
/Help - 显示帮助菜单
/Help Set <行数> <内容> - 设置某一行帮助内容.
/Help Add <行> - 新增一行
/Help Remove <行数> - 移除一行内容.
/Help Reset - 重置所有设置.
/Help Clear - 清除整个帮助菜单.


权限
-使用/Help指令 - 默认拥有
-使用/Help Set/Add/Remove/Reset/Clear指令 - help.administrate

下载地址：



CSTMHelp.jar
(10.77 KB, 下载次数: 139)



2016-10-29 22:03 上传
点击文件名下载附件
